thread.title: The Latest Trailer Of Baywatch Is Out, And Priyanka Chopra Is Visible For Two Seconds
thread.title_full: The Latest Trailer Of Baywatch Is Out, And Priyanka Chopra Is Visible For Two Seconds

title: The Latest Trailer Of Baywatch Is Out, And Priyanka Chopra Is Visible For Two Seconds
text: facebook 783 SHARES Another trailer of Baywatch released recently, and there seems to be a lot of hustling. And while Priyanka Chopra and her villain instincts show up for another (almost) blink and miss appearance, we cannot hold our horses to see her on the big screen with the likes of Dwayne Johnson and Zac Efron. With the two protagonists lying down with the dead in a morgue, Zac dressing up as a “legit hot” girl, and ultimately trying to save the world, this trailer is quite funny! "Drugs. Murder. A dead body on our beach. And it all started once she took over." #BeBaywatch #VictoriaLeeds @baywatchmovie #May26 pic.twitter.com/GRjOpEBqRI
